name: Tower Climb (itch) (Spartan Game Labs)
description: Our game is a 2d platformer where you use a hammer and a rope to climb a tower. The goal of the game is to beat it as fast as possible. The player uses A,D to move and space to jump as well as holding left click when touching your hammer to a platform to use your rope. Using these movement methods the player must climb the tower as fast as possible.
